General.Name: I&C Technology Co. Ltd
General.Description: I&C Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the system semiconductor market. The company provides Internet of things (IoT) solutions relating to Wi-Fi, LTE, and PLC for IoT devices. It also develops wireless communication solutions, including AMI/AMR, multi-media, and lighting controls. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
